T02D3358:38b-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam /
T02D3358:38b-3: gtum po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3358:38b-4: bcom ldan 'das gtum po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3358:38b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D3358:38b-6: pa'i rjes su padma dkar po'i steng na nyi ma
T02D3358:38b-7: la h'um yig nag po de yongs su gyur pa
T02D3358:38b-8: las bcom ldan 'das gtum po chen po khros pa
T02D3358:38b-9: / zar ma'i me tog lta bu /
T02D3358:38b-10: ming gzhan gyis mi g-yo ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3358:38b-11: mi g-yo ba mi mnyam pa'i spyan /
T02D3358:38b-13: mi bzad pa'i zhal chen po /
T02D3358:38b-14: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can mche bas ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3358:38b-15: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3358:38b-16: spyan gnyis dkar zhing dmar ba /
T02D3358:38b-18: g-yon pa'i phyag gis zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnams pa'o //
T02D3358:38b-19: sprul dkar po mchod phyir thogs pa /
T02D3358:38b-20: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa /
T02D3358:38b-21: zhabs g-yon pas la ma reg pa /
T02D3358:38b-22: zhabs g-yas pa cung zhig bteg pa /
T02D3358:38b-23: nyi ma'i 'od kyi phreng ba can gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3358:38b-24: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom
T02D3358:38b-25: pa sngon du 'gro bas mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan
T02D3358:38b-27: de nas bzlas pa ni aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3358:38b-28: gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3358:38b-29: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
